project_manifest.description: Comprehensive Project Manifest for AI assistance.

database_schema.name: APIToken
database_schema.doc: API Tokens for external services and connectors

api_endpoints.doc: Get current user's information including preferences.
Update current user's information and preferences.
Get list of permissions for the current user.
Get overview of all roles and permissions in the system. Uses database for dynamic data.
Get VSCode Server status.
Enable or disable VSCode Server.
Test an integration.
Test a workflow.
List workflows with optional filtering.
Get all workflow categories.
Get all workflow tags.
Generates a new TOTP secret for the user to scan.
Verifies and Saves the MFA secret.
Returns a list of available authentication providers.
Returns a list of available sync providers.
Returns a list of available mail providers.
Returns a list of available theme integrations.
Returns a list of available interpreter integrations.
Returns a list of all monitoring sensors with their status.
Returns a list of available monitoring integrations.
Returns a list of available ticket system integrations.
Exports all system logs as CSV.
Fetches releases from GitHub based on channel using updater integration.
Manually triggers the backup logic (imported from main or reimplemented).

Create an encrypted export package with settings and/or database.
Returns a downloadable ZIP file.
Triggers an update using the updater integration or webhook if configured.

Request admin password reset.
If email matches stored admin_recovery_email, sets pending reset flag.
Requires container restart to complete the reset.
Get current SSL certificate status.
Generate a self-signed SSL certificate for the given domain.
Disable SSL and remove certificates.
Test Active Directory connection with current settings.
Get an AD user by username.
Search for AD users.
Disable an AD user account.
Enable an AD user account.
Get list of all database tables. Admin and HR only.
Get data from a specific table. Admin and HR only.
Get all roles. Admin only.
Get all permissions. Admin only.
Get role details with permissions. Admin only.
Create a new role. Admin only. System roles cannot be created via API.
Update a role. Admin only. System roles cannot be modified.
Delete a role. Admin only. System roles cannot be deleted.
Create a new permission. Admin only.
Update permissions for a role. Admin only. System roles can be updated but with restrictions.
Get integration permissions for a role. Admin only.
Update integration permissions for a role. Admin only.
Get welcome messages. Admin only.
Create a welcome message. Admin only.
Update a welcome message. Admin only.
Delete a welcome message. Admin only.
Get welcome message for current user.
Restart the server. Admin only.
List all installed integrations including system integrations.
Force reload of local integrations.
Uninstall a local integration (delete directory). System integrations cannot be uninstalled.
List available integrations from configured repositories.

Get the README.md content for an integration.
Returns raw markdown content for frontend to render.

Get the CHANGELOG.md content for an integration.
Returns raw markdown content for frontend to render.

Get the configuration for an integration.
Returns current config values and the config schema.

Update the configuration for an integration.
Saves to config.yaml in the integration directory.
System integrations can be configured but changes may be reset on updates.
In demo mode, only demo users cannot save - other users can save normally.

Get complete information about an integration including
manifest, config, and README preview.

Get logs for a specific integration.
Filters SystemLog entries where details contains integration_domain matching integration_id.
Get available integration updates.
Apply an update to an integration.
Get update information for the core system.
Apply a core system update.
Returns employee statistics for dashboard.

Validate a password against security requirements.
Returns validation result with errors and warnings.
